mapper.select: select (select count(1) from pms_comment pc where product_id=pp.id) comment_count,pp.id,pss.sale pss_sale,pp.price,shop_id,detail_html,description,album_pics,pss.spec,pss.price pss_price,pss.id pss_id,pss.pic pss_pic,pss.stock pss_stock from pms_product pp inner join pms_sku_stock pss on pp.id=pss.product_id where delete_status=0 and publish_status=1 and pp.id=#{id}
